official_title: GF-NOURISH (Gluten Free Nutrition Optimization Through Ultra-processed Food Reduction and Improved Strategies for Health)
inclusion_criteria:
* Age 2-18 years of age with recent celiac disease diagnosis
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 2 Years
Must have maximum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Allergic to <3 of the top 8 food allergens
* Co-morbid conditions treated with dietary modifications or that influence nail arsenic values
